name: Moon Raccoon
description:
My very first minigame (made in Construct 2) - an answer to a funny comment on the CubeWorld.org Forum.

 Moon Raccoon is an Arcade Shoot 'em up and the predecessor of my fun app "Raccoon Launcher". You play as commander of the Corgi army and you have to try to stop the invasion of the Raccoons from the moon. Defeat waves of enemies and beat the final boss. You can not fail or your best friend, mankind, will be doomed!

A successor with the name "Moon Raccoon 2" is already planned.

NOTE: The current Windows version may not work for some. I try t o recompile it and upload an update as soon as possible. Soundtrack
  • Title: https://www.ende.tv/music/558-...
  • Intro: https://www.playonloop.com/201...
  • Game Over: https://www.ende.tv/music/157-...
  • Boss battle: https://www.ende.tv/music/154-...
  • Credits: https://www.ende.tv/music/452-...
